text: Simon Duncan Terry was an archer from Great Britain. He was born on 27 February 1974 and died on 19 July 2021. Terry competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics, 2008 Summer Olympics, and the 2012 Summer Olympics.Simon TerrySimon TERRY == References == Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain
title: Simon Terry
